events.message: I recently received my order but would like to request a refund because the product does not meet my expectations.
The customer has requested a refund. Assigning case to the Refund cluster for further processing.
Support agent Sarah has been assigned to handle the refund request for this case.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I understand you want to request a refund. I’m here to help you with that.
Could you please provide your order number and the reason for the refund so I can process your request efficiently?
My order number is 123456789. The item arrived but was not as described on the website, so I want my money back.
Thank you for the information. I will initiate the refund process immediately and send you a confirmation email once it's complete.
Thanks for your quick response. I appreciate you starting the refund process so promptly.
Your refund has been processed successfully and should appear in your account within 3-5 business days.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received your refund and if there’s anything else we can assist you with.
We are closing this case now. Thank you for contacting support, and we hope to serve you better in the future.
